statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 50 AND reorder_point < 20;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 10 OR reorder_point > 30;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_point > 20 ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE '%B' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < reorder_point ORDER BY current_stock ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 10 OR reorder_point > 30 ORDER BY reorder_point DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < max_stock
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, max_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < max_stock ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM stockouts WHERE reason = 'Out of stock' ORDER BY stockout_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory JOIN stockouts ON inventory.product_id = stockouts.product_id;
SELECT MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock_in_inventory FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, max_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < max_stock ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items;
SELECT order_id, quantity_ordered FROM supply_orders;
SELECT item_id, order_date FROM supply_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, item_id, stockout_date FROM stockout_events WHERE resolved_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_items GROUP BY item_id, item_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM inventory_items JOIN supply_orders ON inventory_items.item_id = supply_orders.item_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, stockout_date, resolved_date FROM inventory_items JOIN stockout_events ON inventory_items.item_id = stockout_events.item_id WHERE resolved_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM inventory_items JOIN supply_orders ON inventory_items.item_id = supply_orders.item_id WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevel
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM InventoryLevel WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT id, product_name, last_updated FROM InventoryLevel ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevel WHERE location LIKE 'Ware%'
SELECT id, location FROM InventoryLevel WHERE quantity < 5
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevel WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, location, quantity FROM InventoryLevel WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, location FROM InventoryLevel WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevel WHERE product_name LIKE 'Car%';
SELECT id, product_name, location FROM InventoryLevel WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY location DESC, product_name ASC;
